description: This initiative aims to empower rural families in a specific region by promoting sustainable agricultural practices and enhancing local economies. Originating from a small group of families, it focuses on cultivating native Amazonian fruits and developing agroforestry systems. The project emphasizes environmental conservation while providing technical training and resources to its members. Despite facing challenges in financial sustainability and regulatory compliance, the initiative has garnered international support and aims to transition local producers from traditional livestock farming to more sustainable practices that leverage the unique biodiversity of the Amazon.
name: UTAI
